data.title: Greg Cobb on LinkedIn: #iils2024 #insuranceevents #insuranceinvestor #sustainableinsurance #pri…
data.meta_description:
YELLOWBRICK ROADS, FLYING MONKEYS and THE LOLLIPOP GUILD!
Call me OZ as I pull the levers behind the curtain with our panel of insurance professionals…
data.text: Join us for our next AOB educational session, "Introduction to Sidecars," hosted by Walkers Bermuda on Thursday, August 15th, 2024, from 1:00 PM to 2:00 PM AST! This will be a virtual session which will cover how sidecars are set up from a legal standpoint, the types of vehicles that are used and an overview of the key transaction terms of a typical reinsurance agreement used within a P&C context. The end of the session will touch briefly on what vehicle might be optimal for sponsors ceding P&C risk versus those ceding Life & Annuities business. We can't wait to see you there! This is a members only event! Members register here: https://lnkd.in/dJKuCktn If you are not a Registered AOB member yet, please sign up here: https://lnkd.in/d_6C5NHT
